description: before Dr.M.D.W.Lokuge Vs. Dr. Dayasiri Fernando- Hon. A.H.M.D. Nawaz, J -Mandamus or certiorarified mandamus -Are these remedies available against the PSC when the PSC has already acted? Availability of certiorarified mandamus in Sri Lanka
